lead_paragraph: Top-seeded Maria Sharapova’s hopes of a second successive WTA Tour title ended yesterday when she was upset, 7-5 6-2, by her fellow Russian Elena Dementieva in the JP Morgan Chase Open semifinals in Carson, Calif.
